Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the individuals in the video are Malawian soldiers celebrating a recent election ruling, when in fact they are members of the police force.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is evidence from a retired army brigadier and a police spokesman confirming that the individuals in the video are police officers, not soldiers.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the video shows Malawian soldiers celebrating the recent election ruling, without providing sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the retired army brigadier and police spokesman, who state that the individuals in the video are members of the police force, not soldiers.
